item.title: Paste Text Only in Word - CTRL + SHIFT + V to Microsoft Word
item.description: Are you needing to copy/paste a lot of content from online to Microsoft Word? Yep! It seems small, but Word has the most annoying lack of a shortcut, no CTRL + SHIFT + V – paste text only. Word has the ability to paste text only via right-click, select option. So, let’s quickly add a new shortcut to paste text only in Word. First, go to File > Options > Customize Ribbon > Keyboard shortcuts: Customize…
